# Patrol
![Patrol promotional graphics](https://patrol.leancode.co/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpatrol_lncd.c4dc762e.png&w=3840&q=75)
Patrol is a powerful, open-source UI testing framework designed specifically for Flutter apps and released in September 2022. Developed and maintained by [LeanCode](https://leancode.co), one of the world’s leading Flutter development consultancies, Patrol builds upon Flutter's core testing tools to enable developers to do things that were previously impossible.
## [Why choose Patrol?](#why-choose-patrol)
### [Native Access, Redefined](#native-access-redefined)
Unlock [**native platform features**](https://patrol.leancode.co/documentation/native/overview) right within your Flutter tests. With Patrol, you can:
-   Interact with **permission dialogs**, **notifications**, and **WebViews**.
-   Modify **device settings**, toggle **Wi-Fi**, and more.
-   Achieve all this effortlessly using plain **Dart** code.
### [Intuitive Test Writing](#intuitive-test-writing)
Say goodbye to complexity with Patrol’s custom finder system.
-   Streamline your test code with a shorter, more readable, [**new custom finder system**](https://patrol.leancode.co/documentation/finders/overview).
-   Enjoy the speed and convenience of [**Hot Restart**](https://patrol.leancode.co/cli-commands/develop), which makes integration testing faster, easier, and more fun.
-   Quickly inspect the currently visible Android/iOS views and discover their properties with the **Patrol DevTools extension**.
### [Production-Ready Integration Testing](#production-ready-integration-testing)
Patrol revolutionizes Flutter’s built-in `integration_test` plugin:
-   Overcomes its limitations with **full test isolation** between tests and **sharding**.
-   Delivers a robust, **production-grade solution** for your app testing needs.
-   Offers **console logs** to get real-time insights during test execution.
### [Compatible with Device Farms](#compatible-with-device-farms)
With Patrol's native-like testing capabilities, you can use popular device farms like:
-   Firebase Test Lab
-   BrowserStack
-   LambdaTest
-   Marathon
-   emulator.wtf
-   AWS Device Farm
## [Trusted by LeanCode and the Flutter Community](#trusted-by-leancode-and-the-flutter-community)
Patrol is a fully open-source project, and we're proud to share it with the amazing Flutter community. Patrol isn’t just a tool; it’s a commitment to quality. At LeanCode, we use Patrol to test production-grade apps for clients across industries, and now, you can do the same!
[Get Patrol from pub.dev now!](https://pub.dev/packages/patrol)
